title: Topology of a Phantom City
description: Paperback in acceptable condition. Previous owner has penned and dated FEP. General shelf and handling wear, including creasing and wear to cover, edges and corners, rubbing and light scoring to cover, and small area of surface paper damage to rear. Pageblock is tanned and lightly marked. Within, pages are well bound; occasional blemish noted, however content is clear and bright. CN
author: Alain Robbe-Grillet
